content: दृंह् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (दृंहति, दृंहित) {@--1@} To make firm, strengthen. {@--2@} To make fast, fasten. {@--3@} To fortify. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> (दृंहते) {@--1@} To be firm. {@--2@} To grow or increase.
दृह्, दृंह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (दर्हति, दृंहति) {@--1@} To be fixed or firm. {@--2@} To grow, increase. {@--3@} To prosper. {@--4@} To fasten.
